timeline.bodyText: Small typo in th but may be this doc can be simplified a bit, may be just Provides an indirection between credentials consumers such as Agroal and implementers such as Vault....
timeline.author: sberyozkin
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -2,11 +2,21 @@
 
 import java.util.Map;
 
+/**
+ * Service Programming Interface that provides an indirection between credentials consumers (e.g. agroal)
+ * and implementers (e.g. vault). Detailed information is available in th dedicated guide.
